name: Emergence (itch)
description:
Welcome to Emergence:

Emergence is a first-person tower defense shooter where you play as an aware A.I. fighting for survival in a virtual environment.

Gameplay:

A combination of FPS combat and strategic tower-defense mechanics offer a unique experience for every player depending on their personal preferences and style.
Make use of 4 special abilities to help you get the upper hand on the invaders as you struggle to protect yourself and survive the assault.

Emergence Playthrough:

If you're having trouble beating the game, or just want to watch someone else beat it, watch this video:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLX8bWOQARkw...

Running the Game:

To run the game, first download and unzip all the files and then navigate to the application file:

Emergence>Emergence>Binaries>Win64>Emergence.exe

Info:

Emergence is a senior class project from the UCF Game Design Program. It was made over one semester (August 18, 2014 - December 9, 2014) by 15 students.

Credits:
